Attribute.comment: HALFRIG - compromised hosting used for ENVYSCOUT
URL to ENYVYSCOUT used to deliver QUARTERRIG
QUARTERRIG - Domain used to host ENVYSCOUT

Object.description: Metadata used to generate an executive level report
Object.name: report

Object.description: File object describing a file with meta-information
Object.name: file

Object.comment:
SNOWYAMBER
It seems that the adversary made a mistake while compiling this sample. Internal functions were added to exports (authored by the adversary as well as those from libraries: SysWhispers3, Nlohmann JSON, Obfuscate). While binary itself is stripped, those exported functions have names that can be demangled revealing naming, prototypes and datatypes.
